name: WhatisIslam
0:
”Alexa, open What is Islam”
”Alexa, ask What is Islam about the rights of women”
”Alexa, ask What is Islam to Play the Azan”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what is islam
des:
Curious about Islam and the Quran or you are a Muslim and just want to learn more about your religion or listen to high-quality Sermons/Khudahs? 
Discover this misrepresented religion that is followed by almost 2 billion women and men around the world.

You may ask things like:
"What is Islam?"
"What are the 99 names of Allah?"
